title: So the Vayne Q- buff has no explanation? Nothing in the patch notes?
body:
http://prntscr.com/m4mmaz

And where's the explanation / reasoning for it? The fuck kind of cheeky crap is this? They provided no reasoning just "This is a spicy buff, make sure not to tumble into the enemies ;);););)"...the hell is this shit?

replies.body: They also explain to you that the buff doesn't do anything if you don't get the autos off.
“This is a spicy buff to Vayne's mid- and late-game teamfighting” so a buff to her mid and late game.

> [{quoted}](name=Phieldworker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-08T22:17:53.867+0000)
>
> “This is a spicy buff to Vayne's mid- and late-game teamfighting” so a buff to her mid and late game.

Yeah, no shit. But why? Why does she need this? What facilitates this change? Who asked for this? What's the reasoning?

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-09T00:50:45.419+0000)
>
> Yeah, no shit. But why? Why does she need this? What facilitates this change? Who asked for this? What's the reasoning?

Vayne mains probably I dunno. You just said has no explanation when they clearly give an explanation.

> Vayne mains probably I dunno. 

You just said they gave an explanation while saying you don't know.

Do you even read the shit you say? There is NO explanation given. They just gave Vayne a massive buff for no reason.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T10:47:11.831+0000)
>
> You just said they gave an explanation while saying you don't know.
> 
> Do you even read the shit you say? There is NO explanation given. They just gave Vayne a massive buff for no reason.

I do read what I say. I’m just saying they gave an explanation and it was good enough for me. I’m sorry that it doesn’t fit all of your criteria for an explanation. I just don’t get as bent outta shape like you.
What the hell IS the explanation then? Quote it.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T18:12:52.693+0000)
>
> What the hell IS the explanation then? Quote it.

Already did. Just because it’s not the answer you want doesn’t mean it doesn’t work for other people. Don’t be a child about it.
No...you..didn't. There is literally nothing you quoted. There is nothing in the patch notes that justifies the buff. The f*ck are you on man?

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-09T22:32:58.441+0000)
>
> No...you..didn't. There is literally nothing you quoted. There is nothing in the patch notes that justifies the buff. The f*ck are you on man?

My very first post: “This is a spicy buff to Vayne's mid- and late-game teamfighting” so a buff to her mid and late game.


Sad that I have to quote the quote again because you aren’t paying attention. It is a buff to her mid and late game. From my understanding they felt she was lacking there so they added it. Now you can max W first and her q is still relevant in team fights. 

Like I said the message in the patch notes was sufficient for me. I’m sorry it isn’t for you.

http://s3.amazonaws.com/production.photos.funnyordie.com/upload/aff3567c9abaad4b798a350dc1e1b1a3/3niAkdzQiOTxZUUZ642W_Steve%20Harvey%20Face%2012.gif

That isn't an explanation. Extrapolating "Her late game was weak i guess...." is not sufficient reasoning. The very point of the little text above most balance changes where they explain stuff is there **because they explain stuff there**. They pointed out the obvious without anything to back it up and with no real explanation, other than interpretation which is not how you justify balance changes.

I have no idea how can you suck up to such literal interpretations. It's not sufficient for any half-sentient being who knows that balance changes need to have a reason behind them, especially when they are so massive. It's like removing Nasus' W from the game and putting nothing but "We removed his W. Big oof, guys! <3" in the patch notes.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T17:02:56.232+0000)
>
> http://s3.amazonaws.com/production.photos.funnyordie.com/upload/aff3567c9abaad4b798a350dc1e1b1a3/3niAkdzQiOTxZUUZ642W_Steve%20Harvey%20Face%2012.gif
> 
> That isn't an explanation. Extrapolating "Her late game was weak i guess...." is not sufficient reasoning. The very point of the little text above most balance changes where they explain stuff is there **because they explain stuff there**. They pointed out the obvious without anything to back it up and with no real explanation, other than interpretation which is not how you justify balance changes.
> 
> I have no idea how can you suck up to such literal interpretations. It's not sufficient for any half-sentient being who knows that balance changes need to have a reason behind them, especially when they are so massive. It's like removing Nasus' W from the game and putting nothing but "We removed his W. Big oof, guys! <3" in the patch notes.

Much like this conversation I’m over it.

> [{quoted}](name=Phieldworker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T20:15:11.585+0000)
>
> Much like this conversation I’m over it.

Yeah, because you finally realized how abysmally obtuse you were.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T21:14:14.104+0000)
>
> Yeah, because you finally realized how abysmally obtuse you were.

No I just realize we have a difference in opinion and that’s ok. We aren’t going to convince each other.

> [{quoted}](name=Phieldworker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dE7odmRO,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T21:22:24.837+0000)
>
> No I just realize we have a difference in opinion and that’s ok. We aren’t going to convince each other.

I wasn't stating opinions, i was stating facts. There is undeniably no explanation. Extrapolation is not an explanation. There is nothing to dispute here.

But sure, pretend it is one.
what do you mean right in the patch there is a vayne skin?
What? What are you talking about? I never mentioned her upcoming skin. It has nothing to do with her Q getting buffed out of nowhere.
its a joke man take it easy. She is getting a prestige skin so take it how you want to, but it seems almost too convenient
lol 90% of patch notes is like this all they do is say what it does without a explanation like this is nothing new.
